review.title: “Growing Experience”
review.pros: Pros – Because It's a small firm it allows you to be exposed to all phases of the project and you have the opportunity to have client interaction and consultants too. Office environment is good nice easy good people.
review.cons: Cons – Money in this company is a big issue. You do not get direct deposit and as an advice you should cash checks before making a deposit to you account.. (They might bounce)....
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – There should be more office team meetings to check status of projects.
